description: New research suggests dark matter may interact with neutrinos, explaining why cosmic structures today are less clumpy than expected. This subtle interaction challenges the standard Lambda Cold Dark Matter model and could guide particle physics experiments. If confirmed, it would be a fundamental breakthrough, reshaping our understanding of the universe and the evolution of matter across cosmic time.
title: Dark Matter May Interact with Cosmic Ghost Particles, Hinting at a Fundamental Breakthrough

description: New research suggests the universe may be asymmetric, challenging the long-accepted Lambda-CDM model and standard cosmology principles.
title: New Research Suggests the Universe Could Be Lopsided, Raising Cosmology Questions

description: Premium true wireless earbuds in India now focus on sound quality, smart noise cancellation, stable connectivity, comfort, and deeper ecosystem integration. Thislist highlights five top options in 2026: AirPods Pro 3 with health tracking and Apple Intelligence features, JBL Tour Pro 3 with a touchscreen smart case, Sony WF-1000XM5 for class-leading ANC, Sennheiser Momentum True Wireless 4 for audiophile-grade sound, and Samsung Galaxy Buds 3 Pro for Galaxy AI integration. Each caters to different premium user priorities.
title: Best Premium Earbuds to Buy in 2026: AirPods Pro 3, Sony WF-1000XM5, Galaxy Buds 3 Pro and More

description: Smartphones with 80W fast charging can refill large batteries quickly compared to traditional chargers. If charging speed is your priority, you can consider options including the Oppo A6 Pro, OnePlus 15R, Oppo Find X9 Pro, Realme P4 Pro 5G, and Vivo X300 Pro. Some models come with a battery capacity of 7,000mAh or more.
title: Best Smartphones in India With 80W or More Fast Charging Support: Oppo A6 Pro 5G, OnePlus 15R, Vivo X300 Pro, More

description: State Bank of India (SBI) is a government-owned bank that is headquartered in Mumbai. The financial institution provides various banking services to its customers, including savings accounts, loans, bank lockers, and insurance. While SBI customers can get the account statement by visiting a nearby branch, it is often more convenient to download the same online. Hence, SBI allows customers to download their statements from the bank’s internet banking portal or the YONO SBI mobile banking app. However, the bank provides it as a password-protected PDF for privacy and security.
title: SBI Statement Password: What is it, How to Open Statement PDF, and More

description: An unannounced Life is Strange game has been leaked via a now deleted PEGI listing. The game's PS5 version was rated on the website, suggesting a new game in Square Enix's narrative adventure series is on its way. Life is Strange: Double Exposure, the last game in the series, was released in 2024.
title: New Life Is Strange Game From Square Enix Leaked After PEGI Rating Surfaces

description: Itel Zeno 20 Max has been launched in India in three colour options. The new phone features a 5,000mAh battery and a 13-megapixel rear camera unit. It has the Dynamic Bar feature and is equipped with the Unisoc T7100 chipset. It features a 6.6-inch 90Hz HD+ display and has an 8-megapixel selfie shooter. The Itel Zeno 20 Max has 15W charging support.
title: Itel Zeno 20 Max Launched in India With Unisoc T7100 SoC, 5,000mAh Battery: Price, Specifications

description: OnePlus Turbo 6 and OnePlus Turbo 6V have been launched in China with Snapdragon chipsets. The new lineup features 9,000mAh battery units and has IP66 + IP68 + IP69 + IP69K ratings for dust and water resistance. OnePlus Turbo 6 is launched in Light Chaser Silver, Lone Black and Wild Green (translated from Chinese) colourways.
title: OnePlus Turbo 6, Turbo 6V Launched With 9,000mAh Battery, Snapdragon Chipsets: Price, Specifications

description: Oppo Pad 5 has been launched in India by the Chinese smartphone maker. The new tablet was unveiled during a live event, which also saw the unveiling of the Oppo Reno 15, Reno 15 Pro, Reno 15 Pro Mini, and Reno 15C. The new Pad 5 boasts a 10,050mAh battery, with 33W SuperVOOC wired fast charging support. It sports a 12.1-inch LCD screen with up to 120Hz of refresh rate, 2.8K (2,800×1,980 pixels) resolution, and up to 900 nits of peak brightness. It will go on sale in India via Flipkart and the Oppo online store.
title: Oppo Pad 5 Launched in India With 10,050mAh Battery, 12.1-Inch Display: Price, Specifications

description: Spotify has introduced two new Messages features, Listening activity and Request to Jam, to make music sharing more social. Listening activity lets users share what they are playing in real time with connected contacts, while Request to Jam allows Premium users to invite others into shared listening sessions. Free users can join Jams when invited. The features are rolling out on iOS and Android in select markets, with wider availability expected by early February, and are limited to users aged 16 and older.
title: Spotify Launches Real-Time Listening Activity and Request to Jam Feature

description: In a post on X, Similarweb shared the “generative AI website worldwide traffic share” data. The web traffic analytics platform revealed how the footfall for various AI websites changed over the course of the last 12 months, or the entirety of 2025. One of the biggest takeaways was the decline of ChatGPT’s traffic share, which dropped from 86.7 percent to 64.5 percent.
title: ChatGPT vs Gemini Traffic Trend in 2025 Shows Why OpenAI Raised Code Red

description: Crypto markets eased after recent rallies, with Bitcoin slipping below the $91,000 level amid softer volumes and a broader risk-off tone. Analysts said the move appears corrective rather than structural, as long-term positioning remains stable. Attention is now on the US jobs report and other macro triggers, while altcoins continue to track Bitcoin lower in a selective and cautious market environment.
title: Crypto Market Slumps as Bitcoin Price Drops Below $91,000 Amidst Risk-Off Sentiment

description: Honor Magic 8 Pro Air will be launched in China by the Chinese smartphone maker on January 19, the tech firm announced on Thursday via a social media post. However, the company has yet to reveal other details about the upcoming handset, like its specifications, features, design, and colourways. Separately, a tipster has shared the real-life image of the Honor Magic 8 Pro Air, revealing its colourways and design. The phone is said to pack a 5,500mAh battery.
title: Honor Magic 8 Pro Air Launch Date Announced; Tipster Leaks Design, Colour Options

description: Motorola recently unveiled several ecosystem products during the Lenovo Tech World showcase at the Consumer Electronics Show (CES). The company has now teased the launch of one of the devices in India, too. A teaser shared on social media indicates that the company is gearing up to launch a new smartwatch in the country. While details remain under wraps, the teased design hints towards a possible debut of the new Moto Watch, which was unveiled at the tech trade show on January 7.
title: Motorola Teases Smartwatch Launch in India; Moto Watch Unveiled at CES Expected to Debut

description: Based on our first impressions, the Poco M8 5G seems to be a thoughtfully planned successor to the disappointing M7 5G. On paper, there are indications that the phone is designed to address the needs of regular usage. But will it deliver on everything it claims to offer? Stay tuned for our full Poco M8 5G review, which drops on January 12, to find out.
title: Poco M8 5G First Impressions

description: Poco has launched the Poco M8 Pro 5G in select global markets alongside the Poco M8 5G, though it is not yet available in India. Priced from $299 (roughly Rs. 26,900), the phone features a 6.83-inch 1.5K AMOLED display, Snapdragon 7s Gen 4 chipset, up to 12GB RAM, and Android 15-based HyperOS 2. It offers a 50-megapixel main OIS camera, a 6,500mAh battery with 100W fast charging, stereo speakers, and an IP66, IP69, and IP69K-rated build.
title: Poco M8 Pro 5G Launched Globally With 6,500mAh Battery, Snapdragon 7s Gen 4 SoC: Price, Features

description: Apple is working on multispectral imaging technology, which it could potentially use in future generations of iPhone cameras, according to supply chain reports. The Cupertino-based tech giant is said to be evaluating components related to multispectral imaging, although it remains at infancy. This is expected to allow for the recording of a wider spectrum of lighting wavelengths. Reports suggest that its inclusion would enhance Apple’s computational photography.
title: Apple Could Equip Future iPhone Cameras With Multispectral Imaging for Improved Image Processing

description: Meta has announced new features for its Meta Ray-Ban Display smart glasses at CES 2026, including a built-in teleprompter and EMG-based handwriting input using the Meta Neural Band. The teleprompter will roll out in phases, while handwriting support is limited to Early Access users in the US. Meta also expanded pedestrian navigation to four more cities. At the same time, the company paused plans to launch the glasses outside the US due to strong demand and limited inventory.
title: CES 2026: Meta Ray-Ban Display Updated With Teleprompter, EMG Handwriting; Global Launch Delayed

description: CMF Headphone Pro will be launched in India by the smartphone maker on January 13, the company announced on Thursday. The new headphones, which were first unveiled in select global markets, will go on sale in India in white, green, and black colour options. The company recently announced that the CMF Watch 3 Pro will also arrive in the country, along with the Headphone Pro. The global variant of the over-ear headphones is claimed to provide up to 100 hours of battery life and a dedicated Energy Slider.
title: CMF Headphone Pro India Launch Date Announced: Expected Features, Specifications

description: Grok, the artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot created by Elon Musk’s xAI, has sparked a major controversy following an update to its image editing capability. The chatbot received a feature that allowed it to edit any public image posted on the social media platform. Soon after, several users began exploiting the feature by asking the AI chatbot to make sexually suggestive edits to women’s images.
title: Grok AI Scandal: X Faces Global Crackdown Over Non-Consensual Deepfakes

description: The OTT platforms are ready to drop intense dramas, thrillers, romance, and more for the week. Top releases include De De Pyaar De 2, The Night Manager S2, Akhanda 2, and more.
title: OTT Releases of the Week (Jan 5 - Jan 11): De De Pyaar De 2, Akhanda 2, Tron Ares, The Night Manager S2, and More

description: Radheyaa is a dark and intense crime thriller directed by Vedaguru that delves into the psychological impact of childhood neglect and abuse. The film traces the transformation of Radheyaa into a ruthless serial killer who confesses to multiple murders, raising questions about morality, violence and human cost.
title: Radheyaa Now Streaming on Sun NXT: A Dark Crime Thriller Exploring the Mind of a Serial Killer

description: Samsung reportedly filed a patent with the World Intellectual Property Organisation (WIPO) showing a different design for a foldable phone. The alleged sketches of the patent suggest that Samsung is planning to work on a reversible front-and-back flip phone design. The sketches show the device in different angles in folded and unfolded positions.
title: Samsung's Patent Document Explores Unique Flip Phone With Reversible Design

description: Silent Screams: The Lost Girls Of Telangana is the first true crime documentary from Hyderabad, streaming now on Sun NXT. Narrated by Shruti Haasan, it revisits chilling missing girls’ cases from regions like Hajipur, Warangal and Yellapatar.
title: Silent Screams: The Lost Girls Of Telangana Now Streaming Online: What You Need to Know

description: Sony has unveiled a new Hyperpop Collection of PS5 console covers and DualSense controllers, featuring three new striking designs. The new accessories will be launched in select regions in March, with pre-orders going live next week.
title: Sony's New Hyperpop Collection of PS5 Console Covers, DualSense Controllers Launches March

description: The Bluff is a swashbuckling thriller set in the 19th-century Caribbean, starring Priyanka Chopra Jonas as a reformed pirate forced back into danger when her past returns. Featuring Karl Urban as the antagonist, the film will premiere on Prime Video on February 25, 2026.
title: The Bluff OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Priyanka Chopra Jonas Starrer Online?

description: GTA 6 is still not "content complete", according to Bloomberg's Jason Schreier. Speaking on a podcast, the journalist said that Rockstar Games was still finalizing levels and missions the last he heard, but stressed that the new November 19, 2026, release date felt more "real" and "solid" than previous ones.
title: GTA 6 Reportedly Still Not 'Content Complete', but New Release Date More 'Real' and 'Solid' Than Last One

description: Infinix Note Edge is set to launch on January 19. It will be the first smartphone to arrive globally with the new MediaTek Dimensity 7100 SoC. It will feature Android 16-based XOS 16 and 5G support. The upcoming smartphone is speculated to come with a 3D curved AMOLED display with 1.5K resolution and a 6,500mAh battery.
title: Infinix Note Edge Launch Date Announced; Will Debut as First MediaTek Dimensity 7100 SoC-Powered Smartphone

description: The Oppo Reno 15 Series 5G was launched in India on Thursday. It arrives as the succeessor to the Reno 14 series from 2024 and comprises three models — Oppo Reno 15, Reno 15 Pro, and Reno 15 Pro Mini. While the former two are build upon the features of the previous generation, the latter is a new model introduced in India for the first time. The Oppo Reno 15 Series 5G runs on Android 16-based ColorOS 16.
title: Oppo Reno 15 Pro, Reno 15 Pro Mini Launched in India With Dimensity 8450, Reno 15 Tags Along: Price, Features

description: Poco M8 5G has been launched in India by the Xiaomi sub-brand as the successor to the Poco M7. The smartphone will go on sale in India soon via Flipkart and the company website in Carbon Black, Glacial Blue, and Frost Silver colourways. The phone boasts a 5,520mAh battery, which is claimed to offer up to 1.6 days of battery backup on moderate use. It is powered by Qualcomm’s Snapdragon 6 Gen 3 chipset. The new Poco handset also supports 45W wired fast charging and 18W reverse wired charging.
title: Poco M8 5G Launched in India With 5,520mAh Battery, 50-Megapixel Camera: Price, Specifications

description: Samsung has reportedly explained that delays to Google Play system updates on Galaxy smartphones are intentional and linked to internal software validation. The clarification follows user reports of outdated Play system versions despite recent Android security patches. Samsung told a German publication it paused these updates during new device launches and major One UI releases to avoid compatibility issues. The company said updates should resume in January 2026 and does not consider the delay a security risk.
title: Samsung Reportedly Explains Reason Behind Google Play System Update Delays on Galaxy Smartphones

description: OpenAI unveiled ChatGPT Health, a dedicated health and wellness experience that allows users to connect their personal medical records and fitness apps to ChatGPT for context-aware responses on lab results, appointments, diet, and exercise advice. Data in the Health space is isolated and encrypted with enhanced privacy protections, and OpenAI said it does not use this data to train its foundation models.
title: ChatGPT Health Arrives as OpenAI’s Biggest Step Towards AI-Powered Healthcare Yet

description: Flipkart Republic Day Sale 2026 will be kicked off by the e-commerce platform on January 17, the company announced on Thursday.
title: Flipkart Republic Day Sale 2026 Date Announced; Discounts, Offers Teased

description: Samsung Galaxy S26 series will be launched on February 25, a tipster claimed in a social media post. This is in line with a November 2025 report, which suggested that the South Korean smartphone maker will host the Galaxy Unpacked 2026 event to unveil the Galaxy S26, Galaxy S26+, and Galaxy S26 Ultra on February 25. However, in the past, reports have also contradicted this claim, hinting at a late January launch. However, the company is expected to confirm the Galaxy S26 series launch in the coming weeks.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Series Launch Date Leaked Again: Expected Features, Specifications

description: The Google Play Store could soon launch a new "Try before you buy" feature. The feature could allow users to try out paid games for free before making a purchase. Once the trial period ends, users can purchase the games, and they will be able to carry over the progress made during the trial. Trials are expected to be limited to one trial per game listing per user.
title: Google Play Store Could Soon Let Users Try Out Paid Games Before Purchasing Them: Report

description: Roblox has started a global rollout requiring users to complete age checks to access chat features. The requirement, tested earlier in select regions, is expanding to all markets where chat is available. The system uses facial age estimation handled by third-party vendor Persona, with images deleted after processing. Verified users are placed into age-based chat groups to limit adult-minor interaction. Age checks are optional for gameplay but mandatory for chat, with appeal and re-verification options available.
title: Roblox Begins Global Rollout of Mandatory Selfie-Based Age Verification for Chat Features

description: The insatiable demand for artificial intelligence (AI) and server capacity continues to wreak havoc in the memory market. According to a market research and consulting firm, the ongoing DRAM shortage caused memory prices to surge by up to 50 percent in 2025. It is also anticipated to soar by another 50 percent in the first quarter (Q1) of 2026, significantly impacting not just the hardware manufacturers, but also the end user, as the cost of devices increases along with the Bill of Materials (BoM).
title: Memory Prices Expected to Surge Further in 2026 as DRAM Shortage Deepens: Counterpoint

description: WhatsApp on Wednesday announced several new features aimed at helping users stay connected and express themselves better in group chats. The Meta-owned instant messaging platform is rolling out member tags, which can be added to a user’s name to provide more contextual information about them. They can also turn any word they type into a sticker, using the new text stickers feature. WhatsApp has also introduced event reminders for invitees.
title: WhatsApp Introduces Member Tags for Group Chats, Event Reminders, and More

description: Poco M8 5G is set to launch in India later today. The handset, which will be available for purchase in India via Flipkart and the Xiaomi India online store, will be offered in Carbon Black, Glacial Blue, and Frost Silver colourways. The phone will be powered by a Snapdragon 6 Gen 3 chipset, paired with 8GB of RAM. It will also run on Xiaomi’s Android 15-based HyperOS 2.0. The phone is teased to sport a 6.77-inch 3D Curved Display, with up to 3,200 nits of peak brightness and up to 120Hz of refresh rate.
title: Poco M8 5G Launching Today: Know Price in India, Features, Specifications and More

description: The Oppo Reno 15 Series 5G is all set be launched in India today. Arriving as the successor to 2025’s Reno 14, the upcoming lineup is expected to comprise three models — Oppo Reno 15, Reno 15 Pro, and the all-new Reno 15 Pro mini. In the days leading up to its launch, the company has revealed that the Reno 15 series will place a strong emphasis on design and AI-enhanced photography.
title: Oppo Reno 15 Series 5G Launching Today: Know Price in India, Features, Specifications and More
